name: Sit-UpChallenge
0:
”Alexa, start situp challenge”
”Alexa, ask situp challenge to begin the challenge”
”I did it!”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: situp challenge
des:
Take part in this fitness challenge and train until you can do 200 sit-ups!
Based on how many sit-ups you can currently do, the skill calculates your sit-up level so that everyone can start right away!

The skill does not instruct you how to do a correct sit-up. Check out this on how to do it: https://www.wikihow.com/Do-a-Basic-Sit-Up

The following commands are supported:

start situp challenge to launch the skill
start a challenge to start the daily challenge
reset [Number of Situps you were able to do] to calibrate the app to your current level (this has to be done at first before you can start)

Report whether you succeeded in doing the instructed situps by re-launching the skill and simply saying "success" or "fail"!

Don't worry if you fail sometimes, sticking to it is the key to successful training!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
